title: Wholemeal banana and raisin muffins
ingredients: ['75g strong wholemeal pastry flour', '60g wholemeal flour', '100g oat bran', '50g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '125g raisins', '120ml 0% fat plain yogurt', '60g low fat soured cream', '60ml unsweetened apple sauce', '60ml maple syrup', '2 teaspoons egg white', '1 teaspoons vanilla extract', '3 small ripe bananas, mashed', '30g chopped pecans']
